text: So I got a PM from this guy telling me he got an email with my answer -or partially- (like the usual notification) but my post is not in the forum (I can't see it neither) so can I know why it has been removed or what is happening there <@UBUNBSM24>?
I'm not sure, I got that email too. <@U26DVNURX> - any thoughts on why his post disappeared on the Community thread?
